resources.string: \n You must select the application that will lunch the AutoResize Panel \n

The Service(UsageStats) must be enabled before start working.Once clicked please enable de AutoResizeImage Service 

Once enabled when you open the choosen application an option to resize any image willl appear automatically.
 Simple doble tap on the image to resize or click on the big icon of the choosen Image aplication to continue to the Image application and now can choose the already resized picture!!!!!!
Permission is needed to display images.
